articles.description: CJ Massinburg had 24 points, 12 rebounds and five assists and Buffalo clinched the Mid-American Conference East Division title on Friday night with a 95-82 win over Bowling Green.
articles.headline: Buffalo clinches MAC East with 95-82 win over Bowling Green

articles.description: Harvard sophomore Seth Towns poured in 24 points as the Crimson defeated Brown
articles.headline: Harvard moves to 8-1 in Ivy League play  - Via Ivy League

images.caption: Harvard sophomore Seth Towns poured in 24 points as the Crimson defeated Brown
images.name: Harvard moves to 8-1 in Ivy League play  - Via Ivy League

articles.description: The Nevada Wolf Pack seems to have finally gotten the hang of being ranked in the Top 25.
articles.headline: No. 24 Nevada plays at Utah State

articles.description: Jalen Hayes scored 24 points and Oakland beat Cleveland State 82-66 on Friday night to give coach Greg Kampe his 600th career victory.
articles.headline: Oakland wins 82-66 for Kampe's 600 victory

articles.description: Isaiah Reese had 26 points and matched a career-high with six steals to lead Canisius to a 78-60 victory over Monmouth on Friday night for its sixth straight win.
articles.headline: Reese scores 26 points, leads Canisius over Monmouth 79-60

articles.description: Seth Towns had seven of his 24 points in the final 3 1/2 minutes, Christian Juzang added a career-high 21 points, and Harvard survived with a 65-58 win over Brown on Friday night.
articles.headline: Harvard beats Brown 65-58, stays tied for first in Ivy
